summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: format
param.para: A -typed value that specifies the texture format.

param.name: width
param.para: Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE1D_U_DIMENSION (16384). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of textures in the array. The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE1D_ARRAY_AXIS_DIMENSION (2048). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: The maximum number of mipmap levels in the texture. See the remarks in . Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.

param.name: bindFlags
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how to bind the texture to pipeline stages. For a 1D texture, the allowable values are: D3D11_BIND_SHADER_RESOURCE, D3D11_BIND_RENDER_TARGET and D3D11_BIND_DEPTH_STENCIL.

param.name: usage
param.para: A -typed value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to.

param.name: cpuaccessFlags
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies the types of CPU access allowed.

param.name: miscFlags
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies other, less common resource options.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure.
